dn31:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
dn31:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena singalako gahapatiputto kalasseva utthaya rajagaha nikkhamitva allavattho allakeso panjaliko puthudisa namassati—
dn31:1.4: puratthimam disam dakkhinam disam pacchimam disam uttaram disam hetthimam disam uparimam disam.
dn31:2.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisi.
dn31:2.2: Addasa kho bhagava singalakam gahapatiputtam kalasseva vutthaya rajagaha nikkhamitva allavattham allakesam panjalikam puthudisa namassantam—
dn31:2.3: puratthimam disam dakkhinam disam pacchimam disam uttaram disam hetthimam disam uparimam disam.
dn31:2.5: “kim nu kho tvam, gahapatiputta, kalasseva vutthaya rajagaha nikkhamitva allavattho allakeso panjaliko puthudisa namassasi—
dn31:2.6: puratthimam disam dakkhinam disam pacchimam disam uttaram disam hetthimam disam uparimam disan”ti?
dn31:2.7: “Pita mam, bhante, kalam karonto evam avaca:
dn31:2.9: So kho aham, bhante, pituvacanam sakkaronto garum karonto manento pujento kalasseva utthaya rajagaha nikkhamitva allavattho allakeso panjaliko puthudisa namassami—
dn31:2.10: puratthimam disam dakkhinam disam pacchimam disam uttaram disam hetthimam disam uparimam disan”ti.
dn31:2.12: “Na kho, gahapatiputta, ariyassa vinaye evam cha disa namassitabba”ti.
dn31:2.13: “Yatha katham pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye cha disa namassitabba?
dn31:2.14: Sadhu me, bhante, bhagava tatha dhammam desetu, yatha ariyassa vinaye cha disa namassitabba”ti.
dn31:2.15: “Tena hi, gahapatiputta, sunohi sadhukam manasikarohi bhasissami”ti.
dn31:2.16: “Evam, bhante”ti kho singalako gahapatiputto bhagavato paccassosi.
dn31:3.1: “Yato kho, gahapatiputta, ariyasavakassa cattaro kammakilesa pahina honti, catuhi ca thanehi papakammam na karoti, cha ca bhoganam apayamukhani na sevati, so evam cuddasa papakapagato chaddisapaticchadi
dn31:3.2: ubholokavijayaya patipanno hoti. Tassa ayanceva loko araddho hoti paro ca loko.
dn31:3.3: So kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
dn31:3.6: Panatipato kho, gahapatiputta, kammakileso, adinnadanam kammakileso, kamesumicchacaro kammakileso, musavado kammakileso.
dn31:3.9: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn31:5.2: Chandagatim gacchanto papakammam karoti, dosagatim gacchanto papakammam karoti, mohagatim gacchanto papakammam karoti, bhayagatim gacchanto papakammam karoti.
dn31:5.3: Yato kho, gahapatiputta, ariyasavako neva chandagatim gacchati, na dosagatim gacchati, na mohagatim gacchati, na bhayagatim gacchati;
dn31:5.4: imehi catuhi thanehi papakammam na karoti”ti.
dn31:5.6: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn31:7.2: Suramerayamajjappamadatthananuyogo kho, gahapatiputta, bhoganam apayamukham, vikalavisikhacariyanuyogo bhoganam apayamukham, samajjabhicaranam bhoganam apayamukham, jutappamadatthananuyogo bhoganam apayamukham, papamittanuyogo bhoganam apayamukham, alasyanuyogo bhoganam apayamukham.
dn31:8.2: Sanditthika dhanajani, kalahappavaddhani, roganam ayatanam, akittisanjanani, kopinanidamsani, pannaya dubbalikaranitveva chattham padam bhavati.
dn31:8.3: Ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha adinava suramerayamajjappamadatthananuyoge.
dn31:9.2: Attapissa agutto arakkhito hoti, puttadaropissa agutto arakkhito hoti, sapateyyampissa aguttam arakkhitam hoti, sankiyo ca hoti papakesu thanesu, abhutavacananca tasmim ruhati, bahunanca dukkhadhammanam purakkhato hoti.
dn31:9.3: Ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha adinava vikalavisikhacariyanuyoge.
dn31:10.2: Kva naccam, kva gitam, kva vaditam, kva akkhanam, kva panissaram, kva kumbhathunanti.
dn31:10.3: Ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha adinava samajjabhicarane.
dn31:11.2: Jayam veram pasavati, jino vittamanusocati, sanditthika dhanajani, sabhagatassa vacanam na ruhati, mittamaccanam paribhuto hoti, avahavivahakanam apatthito hoti:
dn31:11.4: Ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha adinava jutappamadatthananuyoge.
dn31:12.2: Ye dhutta, ye sonda, ye pipasa, ye nekatika, ye vancanika, ye sahasika. Tyassa mitta honti te sahaya.
dn31:12.3: Ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha adinava papamittanuyoge.
dn31:13.2: Atisitanti kammam na karoti, atiunhanti kammam na karoti, atisayanti kammam na karoti, atipatoti kammam na karoti, atichatosmiti kammam na karoti, atidhatosmiti kammam na karoti.
dn31:13.3: Tassa evam kiccapadesabahulassa viharato anuppanna ceva bhoga nuppajjanti, uppanna ca bhoga parikkhayam gacchanti.
dn31:13.4: Ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha adinava alasyanuyoge”ti.
dn31:13.6: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn31:15.2: Annadatthuharo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo, vaciparamo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo, anuppiyabhani amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo, apayasahayo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo.
dn31:16.1: Catuhi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi annadatthuharo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo.
dn31:16.6: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuhi thanehi annadatthuharo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo.
dn31:17.1: Catuhi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi vaciparamo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo.
dn31:17.2: Atitena patisantharati, anagatena patisantharati, niratthakena sanganhati, paccuppannesu kiccesu byasanam dasseti.
dn31:17.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuhi thanehi vaciparamo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo.
dn31:18.1: Catuhi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi anuppiyabhani amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo.
dn31:18.2: Papakampissa anujanati, kalyanampissa anujanati, sammukhassa vannam bhasati, parammukhassa avannam bhasati.
dn31:18.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuhi thanehi anuppiyabhani amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo.
dn31:19.1: Catuhi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi apayasahayo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo.
dn31:19.2: Suramerayamajjappamadatthananuyoge sahayo hoti, vikalavisikhacariyanuyoge sahayo hoti, samajjabhicarane sahayo hoti, jutappamadatthananuyoge sahayo hoti.
dn31:19.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuhi thanehi apayasahayo amitto mittapatirupako veditabbo”ti.
dn31:19.5: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn31:21.2: Upakaro mitto suhado veditabbo, samanasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo, atthakkhayi mitto suhado veditabbo, anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo.
dn31:22.1: Catuhi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi upakaro mitto suhado veditabbo.
dn31:22.2: Pamattam rakkhati, pamattassa sapateyyam rakkhati, bhitassa saranam hoti, uppannesu kiccakaraniyesu taddigunam bhogam anuppadeti.
dn31:22.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuhi thanehi upakaro mitto suhado veditabbo.
dn31:23.1: Catuhi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi samanasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo.
dn31:23.2: Guyhamassa acikkhati, guyhamassa pariguhati, apadasu na vijahati, jivitampissa atthaya pariccattam hoti.
dn31:23.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuhi thanehi samanasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo.
dn31:24.1: Catuhi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi atthakkhayi mitto suhado veditabbo.
dn31:24.2: Papa nivareti, kalyane niveseti, assutam saveti, saggassa maggam acikkhati.
dn31:24.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuhi thanehi atthakkhayi mitto suhado veditabbo.
dn31:25.1: Catuhi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo.
dn31:25.2: Abhavenassa na nandati, bhavenassa nandati, avannam bhanamanam nivareti, vannam bhanamanam pasamsati.
dn31:25.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuhi thanehi anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo”ti.
dn31:25.5: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn31:27.3: Puratthima disa matapitaro veditabba, dakkhina disa acariya veditabba, pacchima disa puttadara veditabba, uttara disa mittamacca veditabba, hetthima disa dasakammakara veditabba, uparima disa samanabrahmana veditabba.
dn31:28.1: Pancahi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi puttena puratthima disa matapitaro paccupatthatabba—
dn31:28.2: bhato ne bharissami, kiccam nesam karissami, kulavamsam thapessami, dayajjam patipajjami, atha va pana petanam kalankatanam dakkhinam anuppadassamiti.
dn31:28.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi puttena puratthima disa matapitaro paccupatthita pancahi thanehi puttam anukampanti.
dn31:28.4: Papa nivarenti, kalyane nivesenti, sippam sikkhapenti, patirupena darena samyojenti, samaye dayajjam niyyadenti.
dn31:28.5: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi puttena puratthima disa matapitaro paccupatthita imehi pancahi thanehi puttam anukampanti.
dn31:28.6: Evamassa esa puratthima disa paticchanna hoti khema appatibhaya.
dn31:29.1: Pancahi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi antevasina dakkhina disa acariya paccupatthatabba—
dn31:29.2: utthanena upatthanena sussusaya paricariyaya sakkaccam sippapatiggahanena.
dn31:29.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi antevasina dakkhina disa acariya paccupatthita pancahi thanehi antevasim anukampanti—
dn31:29.4: suvinitam vinenti, suggahitam gahapenti, sabbasippassutam samakkhayino bhavanti, mittamaccesu patiyadenti, disasu parittanam karonti.
dn31:29.5: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi antevasina dakkhina disa acariya paccupatthita imehi pancahi thanehi antevasim anukampanti.
dn31:29.6: Evamassa esa dakkhina disa paticchanna hoti khema appatibhaya.
dn31:30.1: Pancahi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi samikena pacchima disa bhariya paccupatthatabba—
dn31:30.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi samikena pacchima disa bhariya paccupatthita pancahi thanehi samikam anukampati—
dn31:30.4: susamvihitakammanta ca hoti, sangahitaparijana ca, anaticarini ca, sambhatanca anurakkhati, dakkha ca hoti analasa sabbakiccesu.
dn31:30.5: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi samikena pacchima disa bhariya paccupatthita imehi pancahi thanehi samikam anukampati.
dn31:30.6: Evamassa esa pacchima disa paticchanna hoti khema appatibhaya.
dn31:31.1: Pancahi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi kulaputtena uttara disa mittamacca paccupatthatabba—
dn31:31.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi kulaputtena uttara disa mittamacca paccupatthita pancahi thanehi kulaputtam anukampanti—
dn31:31.4: pamattam rakkhanti, pamattassa sapateyyam rakkhanti, bhitassa saranam honti, apadasu na vijahanti, aparapaja cassa patipujenti.
dn31:31.5: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi kulaputtena uttara disa mittamacca paccupatthita imehi pancahi thanehi kulaputtam anukampanti.
dn31:31.6: Evamassa esa uttara disa paticchanna hoti khema appatibhaya.
dn31:32.1: Pancahi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi ayyirakena hetthima disa dasakammakara paccupatthatabba—
dn31:32.2: yathabalam kammantasamvidhanena bhattavetananuppadanena gilanupatthanena acchariyanam rasanam samvibhagena samaye vossaggena.
dn31:32.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi ayyirakena hetthima disa dasakammakara paccupatthita pancahi thanehi ayyirakam anukampanti—
dn31:32.4: pubbutthayino ca honti, paccha nipatino ca, dinnadayino ca, sukatakammakara ca, kittivannahara ca.
dn31:32.5: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi ayyirakena hetthima disa dasakammakara paccupatthita imehi pancahi thanehi ayyirakam anukampanti.
dn31:32.6: Evamassa esa hetthima disa paticchanna hoti khema appatibhaya.
dn31:33.1: Pancahi kho, gahapatiputta, thanehi kulaputtena uparima disa samanabrahmana paccupatthatabba—
dn31:33.2: mettena kayakammena mettena vacikammena mettena manokammena anavatadvarataya amisanuppadanena.
dn31:33.3: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi kulaputtena uparima disa samanabrahmana paccupatthita chahi thanehi kulaputtam anukampanti—
dn31:33.4: papa nivarenti, kalyane nivesenti, kalyanena manasa anukampanti, assutam saventi, sutam pariyodapenti, saggassa maggam acikkhanti.
dn31:33.5: Imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pancahi thanehi kulaputtena uparima disa samanabrahmana paccupatthita imehi chahi thanehi kulaputtam anukampanti.
dn31:33.6: Evamassa esa uparima disa paticchanna hoti khema appatibhaya”ti.
dn31:33.8: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
dn31:35.1: Evam vutte, singalako gahapatiputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn31:35.3: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
dn31:35.4: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
dn31:35.5: Upasakam mam bhagava dharetu, ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
